article.name: Skills
article.contents:
Profiency levels:
Level | Proficiency bonus | Additional benefit -----------|-------------------|------------------- untrained | no | take 20 proficient | yes | take 10 expert | yes | once/enc, roll with advantage master | yes | if roll < 10, add 10 legendary | yes | roll 2d20 and add both (doesn't stack with master benefit)
article.bodyHtml:
Profiency levels:

Level Proficiency bonus Additional benefit
untrained no take 20
proficient yes take 10
expert yes once/enc, roll with advantage
master yes if roll < 10, add 10
legendary yes roll 2d20 and add both (doesn't stack with master benefit)
